subject: Football
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Atlanta Falcons cornerback Dunta Robinson was fined $40,000 on Monday for his flagrant hit on Philadelphia Eagles receiver Jeremy Maclin, but he will not face a suspension.
snippet: Atlanta Falcons cornerback Dunta Robinson was fined $40,000 on Monday for his flagrant hit on Philadelphia Eagles receiver Jeremy Maclin, but he will not face a suspension.
